au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=10m_L2=1.3m_offset_apx5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(510,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g4 driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(4) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 38.6144) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.0854)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(263)
